,"loan",{name:"isOut",convert:function(b,a){return !Ext.isEmpty(a.data.loan.out)}},{name:"outTime",convert:function(c,b){console.log("outTime");var a=null;if(b.data.loan.out){a=moment(b.data.loan.out).toDate()}return a}},{name:"outPurpose",convert:function(b,a){return a.data.loan.purpose||""}},{name:"outAgo",convert:function(f,b){var c=b.get("outTime");if(c){var h=HooferSailingMobile.util.Util.pluralize;var g=Ext.Date.getElapsed(HooferSailingMobile.now,c);var e=Math.round(g/1000,0);var a=Math.round(e/60,0);var d=Math.floor(a/60,0);a=(a%60);var i=(d?h(d,"hour")+" ":"")+h(a,"minute");return i}}}]

store.Winds",{extend:Ext.data.ArrayStore,config:{url:"http://metobs.ssec.wisc.edu/app/mendota/buoy/data/jsonp",symbols:"dir:spd",interval:"00:00:00",begin:"-00:05:00",averageKnots:0,gusts:0,weightedAverage:true,windDirectionRose:"",groupField:"windDirectionRose",fields:["windDirectionDegrees","metersPerSecond","time","windDirectionRose","windSpeedKnots"],},fetch:function(){var a=this;Ext.data.JsonP.request({url:this.getUrl(),params:{symbols:this.getSymbols(),begin:this.getBegin(),interval:this.getInterval()},success:function(b){var r=[];var f=[0,0,0];var n=0;var g=b.stamps.length;var t=b.data;var c=b.stamps;for(var p=0;p<g;p++){if(a.getWeightedAverage()&&((p==0)||((p+1)==g))){continue}var k=t[p][0];var l;if(a.getWeightedAverage()){l=(t[p-1][1]+t[p][1]+t[p+1][1])/3}else{l=t[p][1]}var j=moment(c[p]+"Z").toDate();var s=HooferSailingMobile.util.Compass.degreesToRose(k);var o=(l*1.94384);r.push([k,l,j,s,o]);n+=o;var m=t[p][1]*1.94384;for(var h=0;h<f.length;h++){if(m>f[h]){f[h]=o;break}}}a.setData(r);var u=a.getGroups();var e=u[0];Ext.Array.forEach(u,function(d){if(d.children.length>e.children.length){e=d}});a.setWindDirectionRose(e.name);var q=Ext.Array.pluck(r,"knots");a.setAverageKnots(Math.round(n/r.length));a.setGusts(Math.round(Ext.Array.mean(f)));a.fireEvent("fetch",a)}})
